meanings.definition: Capable of being zoomed in or out.
meanings.sent1: The camera had a zoomable lens that allowed me to get closer to the tiny details.
meanings.sent2: The telescope had a zoomable feature that let us see the stars more clearly.
meanings.sent3: I wish my eyes were zoomable so I could read tiny print without squinting.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a zoomable map, able to focus on different details as needed.
meanings.sent5: The binoculars were so zoomable that I could see the birds up close as if they were right in front of me.

meanings.definition: Able to be magnified or reduced in size.
meanings.sent1: The zoomable font on the computer screen made it easier for me to read.
meanings.sent2: The painting was created with zoomable details that amazed the viewers.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a zoomable superhero, able to shrink or grow at will.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a zoomable sun, brightening up the room with its warmth.
meanings.sent5: The map was so zoomable that I could see every street and building clearly, no matter how small.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to adjust the level of magnification.
meanings.sent1: The camera had a zoomable feature that allowed me to focus on different objects.
meanings.sent2: The microscope was zoomable, letting me examine tiny cells with precision.
meanings.sent3: I wish my brain was zoomable so I could remember every detail clearly.
meanings.sent4: His voice was like a zoomable instrument, able to hit high and low notes effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The binoculars were so zoomable that I could adjust the focus to see faraway mountains or nearby flowers with ease.
